name: DC 280/DC 220
description: Designed by Vincenzo De Cotiis in 2007, the DC 220 and DC 280 sofas stand out for their generous surfaces and simple lines. Timeless pieces of furniture, they represent contemporary reinterpretations of classic models. They take centre stage in every living room, their elegance further underlined by the quality of the materials with which they are upholstered: fabric, leather or real leather.
